Documentation.name: GML
Documentation.notes: HollowWorld UML profile for GML Application Schemas

Documentation.name: Extended GAS Profile
Documentation.notes: UML Profile containing adidtional stereotypes and association tagged values that apply to modelling GML Application Schemas

Stereotype.name: Leaf
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Subset of model describing a schema. A leaf package shall not contain any other packages.
XML implementation: All Leaf package contents or component classes are placed within one XML schema document.

Tag.name: xsdDocument
Tag.description: Relative path to XML Schema document corresponding

Stereotype.name: multipleInheritance
Stereotype.notes: generalized class is one of multiple parents. The specialized class is only substitutable for the parent that is the target of the generalization with sequenceNumber=0. Other parents merely supply additional attributes and associations in the content model.

Tag.name: sequenceNumber
Tag.description: Specify position of attribute-group within content

Stereotype.name: property
Stereotype.notes:
Model: attribute or association role represents a 'property' of the containing class.
XML implementation: local xsd:element, the type is either a property type (if the type is a complex type) or a simple type.

Tag.name: sequenceNumber
Tag.description: Specify position of attribute-group within content

Tag.name: isMetadata
Tag.description: flag that attribute or association-end is to be tr

Tag.name: noPropertyElement
Tag.description: suppress creation of local element definition - se

Documentation.name: ISO 19136 Annex E
Documentation.notes: UML Profile containing the stereotypes described in ISO 19136 Annex E, and associated Tagged Values

Stereotype.name: Application Schema
Stereotype.notes:
Model describing implementable elements required for a domain of discourse (see ISO 19109).
Contains definitions of feature-types and other components related to a single conceptually coherent application. This will normally have a single maintenance and governance framework.
XML: Implemented as a single XML Schema.

Tag.name: owner
Tag.description: Party responsible for maintenance of this package

Tag.name: xsdDocument
Tag.description: Relative path to XML Schema document representing this schema

Tag.name: targetNamespace
Tag.description: URI to unique target namespace

Tag.name: xmlns
Tag.description: Prefix associated with namespace

Tag.name: version
Tag.description: Schema version

Tag.name: gmlProfileSchema
Tag.description: an element gml:gmlProfileSchema with the content

Tag.name: classMap
Tag.description: Relative path to document providing a mapping of classes in this schema to their representation as XML Schema element declarations and type definitions

Stereotype.name: CodeList
Stereotype.notes:
Model: extensible enumeration
XML: Union of an enumeration and a pattern (default mapping, an alternative mapping is a reference to a dictionary)

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Tag.name: asDictionary
Tag.description: implement as a dictionary instead of enumeration

Tag.name: codeSpace
Tag.description: URI that identifies the authority for this dictionary and its members

Tag.name: dictionaryIdentifier
Tag.description: URI that identifies this dictionary

Tag.name: memberIdentifierStem
Tag.description: URI stem used for dictionary members

Stereotype.name: DataType
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Defines a structured data type. The instances are not considered objects and shall therefore not have an identity, and may only appear as the type of class attributes or as the target of composition-associations.
XML: Global element, whose content model is a globally scoped XML Schema complexType, property type

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Stereotype.name: Enumeration
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Non-extensible enumerated data type.
XML: Restriction of xsd:string with enumeration values

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Stereotype.name: FeatureType
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Identifiable item of interest
XML: Global element, whose content model is a globally scoped XML Schema type derived by direct/indirect extension of gml:AbstractFeatureType, property type

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Stereotype.name: Type
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Defines an object type. Instances shall have identity.
Note: this is *not* the same as ISO 19103 or UML <<type>>
XML: Global element, whose content model is a globally scoped XML Schema type derived by direct/indirect extension of gml:AbstractGMLType, property type

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: xmlSchemaType
Tag.description: no type shall be generated for the class, but the

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Stereotype.name: Union
Stereotype.notes:
Model: Set of classes, subsitutable by selecting one of its members. Effectively acts as a way to compose a superclass with arbitrary membership, independ of the inheritance hierachy.
XML: Choice group whose members are GML objects or features, or objects corresponding to DataTypes

Tag.name: noPropertyType
Tag.description: suppress automatic creation of *PropertyType compl

Tag.name: byValuePropertyType
Tag.description: enforce the 'by value' property pattern without xl

Tag.name: isCollection
Tag.description: attribute group gml:AggregationAttributeGroup is a

Column.name: Description
Column.value: flag that attribute or association-end is metadata

Column.name: Description
Column.value: Position of element within XML content model

Column.name: Description
Column.value: attribute or role owned by external package
